item.title: Running R on JASMIN
item.description: On the JASMIN sci servers and LOTUS, we support the use of R through the “jasr” environment(s), as listed on the Jaspy page.

item.title: Community Software: ESMValTool
item.description: ESMValTool is installed on JASMIN as a community package. This article provides: a brief overview of the ESMValTool software a description of the main features of the tool a quick-start for using ESMValTool on JASMIN links to further information Overview of ESMValTool   The Earth System Model Evaluation Tool (ESMValTool) is a community diagnostics and performance metrics tool for the evaluation of Earth System Models (ESMs) that allows for routine comparison of single or multiple models, either against predecessor versions or against observations.
